replies.msg: Trump, i do hope u have learnt a lesson this time. Contracts and promises mean nothing to china. So, what ever the delegation promises you on thursday this time, do not trust their words. U should stick to ur plan to raise tariff until there are concrete action taken by chinese government to safeguard the enforcement of contracts.
